sentence: The hospitality of the staff was great and the complimentary happy hours at the bar and free breakfast definitely was a plus
Manager and Staff Excellent
Everything was handled very well from set up to ceremony to reception
Although we did not make it to the beach as we intended our children were able to enjoy our 3 days with an excellent breakfast beautiful 3rd level pool deck and a sweet and amazing staff
The front desk welcomed us and made us feel good about being in the city
Every aspect of the service was top quality from the bell service to front desk to valet parking
This hotel has great rooms great staff and a great layout
Check in was smooth and the front desk attendant even accommodated our request for a room on the highest floor to accommodate my kids request
Entire staff from doorman to restaurant to check in all excellent
The staff was very accommodating and made our stay a pleasant one
I am extremely disappointed in the way the staff handled this issue
I was then told that a transportation service had been provided to transfer me to and from the convention center each day
And the front desk employees were sub par
Big sign on front desk let us Make it Right
Finally after my 3rd visit to the front desk they sent someone up
I have no complaints about the staff and their willingness to help
we left for a conference during the day and when we got back to the hotel I immediately went to the front desk to see if somebody could come to our room now
We called them and asked the desk personnel her advise
Even Chic fil a does a better job with customer service
Normally Embassy Suites has good service and I enjoy my stay with the kids but not this location A waste of money
I do nt care how good the service is stop taking my money
The staff was professional but the experience could have been better if it was less crowded
There was nowhere to sit for happy hour reception or for breakfast and line was out the door
I went down to the front desk to complain and the female manager tried to apologize but in the end gave me an attitude

Tv in room was spotty kept cutting outWhen we called desk they just gave us a free movie and acting like it was normal Not acceptable to have tv that does n’t go 3 min with out signal issues Need water in the lobby Tampa was 90 plus degrees and no water available in the lobby unles you buy it which is not what I ’ve seen in other Hilton ’s hotels
Girl comes up tells us that a lot of the rooms smell like this she was going to check 1507 and see if the front desk can move us
We arrived late at night and no one was at the desk

However we did experience problems getting maid service we had to track one down in the hall to get towels and they never did service our room and at one point the water from the tap was milky white this may have been due to air in the line I set aside a glass to show management and by the next morning it was clearWhen we left for the event the next evening the lobby was again full of people waiting for their rooms so this leads me to believe that this is an ongoing issue
So many people were upset at how bad this hotel service

I ’l spare the details because there are so many but anytime we approached the desk with issues they had to go to the back to the “ mysterious manager ” that no one ever saw and even after speaking with them they never actually solved anything
